summary: HD retexture of all vampire armors.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i031.radikal.ru/1407/64/0ab548800b93.png[/img]
[img]http://i062.radikal.ru/1407/63/1cf03c631f70.png[/img]
HD retexture of all vampire armors:
Vampire boots and gauntlets
Black, white, red versions - female and male
Royal vampire armor – female and male
Valerica’s armor
Serana’s hood
~~~~~~~
[img]http://s019.radikal.ru/i614/1407/25/59685fc8ea4f.jpg[/img]
~~~~~~~
There are also two optional files: a plugin for crafting. All the items can be found under Leather section.
And optional texture pack that will remove the Vampire brooch from all the outfits.

~~~~~~~
[img]http://s52.radikal.ru/i138/1407/a9/cddb7eb1ba25.jpg[/img]
~~~~~~~
[b]Requirements:[/b]
Skyrim version 1.9
DLC Dawnguard

[img]http://s019.radikal.ru/i625/1407/4f/e079a571b8f5.png[/img]
Place mod's files to your Data folder.
Activate CraftableVampireArmor.esp in the game launcher (optional)
[img]http://s58.radikal.ru/i162/1407/0b/4380a8aadff5.png[/img]
Remove “Vampire” folder from following folders:
Data/textures/dlc01/clothes
Remove CraftableVampireArmor.esp from Data folder.
[img]http://s51.radikal.ru/i131/1407/4a/d7a5369e3cb5.png[/img]
Bethesda for Skyrim
My dear friends [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1932308/?]Aisaka[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4184206/?]Urshi[/url] and [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6879930/?] jesusoden[/url] for screenshots and test.
[img]http://s50.radikal.ru/i130/1407/b7/1618fa3f1359.png[/img][/center]
author: Nightshade

files.name: Nightshade Vampire Armor Retexture No Brooch
